channel.title: CVE Feed for Advantech -- ADAM 5550
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Advantech -- ADAM 5550

item.title: CVE-2024-38308|2024-09-27T17:28:34.284Z -- advantech -- adam%205550
item.description: Advantech ADAM 5550's web application includes a "logs" page where all the HTTP requests received are displayed to the user. The device doesn't correctly neutralize malicious code when parsing HTTP requests to generate page output.

item.title: CVE-2024-37187|2024-09-27T17:25:52.630Z -- advantech -- adam%205550
item.description: Advantech ADAM-5550 share user credentials with a low level of encryption, consisting of base 64 encoding.
